title: Fushigi Dagashiya: Zenitendou Movie - Tsuri Taiyaki
original_name: 映画 ふしぎ駄菓子屋 銭天堂 つりたい焼き
opening_song: "Kisoutengai Fushigi wo Douzo (奇想天外ふしぎをどうぞ)" by Emi Noda (野田愛実)
ending_song: "Hanya○ Manten, Zenitendou. (はにゃ ○ 満点、銭天堂。)" by KOCHO
sinopse:
The movie will adapt the first volume following an eight-year-old boy Keiji getting a mysterious snack that can make him fish taiyaki (Japanese fish-shaped cake).

(Source: MAL News)
